website_summaries.verdict: This thin headset mic brings quality hands-free audio to anyone with a Shure wireless transmitter.
pros: It fits perfectly with the necessary Shure wireless transmitter and has very impressive sound quality for such an affordable headset
The adjustable mic position adds more flexibility for getting just the right sound
cons: The overall device feels fragile and cheap
The headset itself isn't adjustable in size, so if it doesn't fit, users will have to find another option

customer_reviews.title: Value-for-money an excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking I was looking for a headset to replace the over-the-ear microphone I had been using. This one fits my head well and is stable. My only issue, is that the microphone prices up on my earlobe, and is uncomfortable. There seems to be no adjustment for that. But it's early and I'm working on fit. As for sound quality I was concerned because I was replacing a very expensive microphone, and this has excellent sound quality. All in all I would recommend this microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Haze

customer_reviews.title: As good as five times the price.
customer_reviews.text: In Pro AV, everyone says get the Countryman headset. But I can buy five of these for the price of one of the others. This headset sounds as natural as any of the subminiature models, and seems to hold up okay over time. I cringe seeing how the talent heaves the more expensive headsets around, so it is a little comfort in knowing that if this headset falls off, it does not cast all the profit off a gig to replace.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: Pastor loves his new microphone and the sound quality is great. Maybe too good, he can't sing all that well and when he forgets to turn off the power unit...well we don't say anything, but.
customer_reviews.author: CDOtto

customer_reviews.title: Great for church use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use in a church setting. Works out nicely when clergy are wearing vestments and don't have anyplace to clip a traditional lapel mic. Feels a little weird to wear at first; takes some getting used to. Only complaint: There's not much adjust-ability to accommodate different head sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and ergonomics !
customer_reviews.text: After running thru 3 other devices DOA, this was a blessing. Sounds great out of the box, no handling noise, nice frequency response. Why drop $350 for a countryman?? When any of them break at the earset, they are trash.... nice value alternative...
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I have the 350$ versions of this mic - we are using both side by side in a talk show environment and it work perfect against the higher cost mic. It obviously does require some equalization to match \.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Headset mic
customer_reviews.text: I have used the most expensive headset mikes to the cheapest ones this one ranks in the higher end of all of them for a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: MIM

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight mic
customer_reviews.text: Great headset and just as good as the Shure sets we have
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Jeffcoat

customer_reviews.title: Speaking through a pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Not bad...if you enjoy sounding like your speaking through a pillow. No amount of EQ could clean it up.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: I am sure it is just because of my super sweaty self
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the security of the double ear setup; but as much as I sweat, this mic did not work for me. It keeps slipping off of my ears and is bothersome to use. Again, I am sure it is just because of my super sweaty self! The quality is good and the price is right. It fit perfectly with my Shure bodypack.
customer_reviews.author: SSpreach

customer_reviews.title: Nice mic
customer_reviews.text: Very good sounding at this price. Nice to have an inexpensive replaceable cable. Will be buying more for several churches.
customer_reviews.author: daknee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They work as well as the more expensive headset mikes, and seem to be more substantial. The sound quality is very rich.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: HOUSE OF WORSHIP
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT USED FOR HOUSE OF WORSHIP. EXCELLENT FOR TONE AND VOICE CONTROL . DISLIKE OF NOT BEING ABLE TO HANDLE THE LOUDER DB LEVELS OF A PREACHER.
customer_reviews.author: LAMAR HOLLIS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Please with quality and its ability to interface with a Shure belt pack.
customer_reviews.author: ctrac

customer_reviews.title: The dual ear pieces ensure that the mike stays in place.
customer_reviews.text: I use this headset to preach each Sunday, and I couldn't be more pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Farthing

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: A very good product for the money. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement
customer_reviews.text: It's a good replacement for the Shure mic itself. Works good and the quality is near the Shure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality for the cost. Good sound quality overall
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Last just a few months and the antenna fell out of the back.
customer_reviews.author: West Nash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it WAY better then I expected, no more $100 mics for me!
customer_reviews.author: Craig McCourt

customer_reviews.title: Good option if the headset fits your head.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good sound; good price; mic position adjustment Cons: Headband is not adjustable; if it doesn't fit your head you have to get used to it Overall: Good option if the headset fits your head.
customer_reviews.author: VILA

product_meta.title: Microdot 4016 Headset Headworn Microphone For SHURE Wireless System - Detachable Cable With Mini XLR Ta4f Connector - Omidirectional Mic
product_meta.description:
Features: 
The 4016 Headset Condenser Microphone is perfect for presentation, fitness and vocal applications. This low profile, miniature condenser microphone provides accurate audio reproduction through its compact 4.0*1.5mm capsule. With microdot detachable cable, easily convert/replace your connectors. Manufactured with extreme care and the highest quality components, the 4016 delivers exceptionally clear, articulate sound with reliable performance in an extremely low profile design! 

-Microdot Detachable Cable with 4 pin mini XLR TA4F connector, Compatible with Shure Wireless Transmitter Models: L1, 11, LX1, SC1, U1, UC1, UT1, T1, ULX1, UR1, PGX 
-Excellent elastic steel bracket and soft plastic ear hang make it more comfortable and stable to adorn 
-Use omnidirectional condenser cartridge, excellent vocal reduction effect, Intermediate frequency is fine and soft, very strong resolution and penetration 
-Special processing of the metal surface, with strict test of acid proof,alkali proof and wear proof, display excellent. Various connecting plugs for choice, matching all kings of wireless system 

Application: 
Stage performances, host, lectures and other PA areas. 

Specifications: 
Polar pattern:Omnidirectional 
Mic diameter: 4.0*1.5mm 
Sensitivity: - 43dB ±2db 
Frequency Range: 20-20KHZ 
Output Impedance: <2.2k ohms 
Standard Operation Voltage: 2.0V-10V.DC 
SNR: >58db 
Wire length: 1.2m 

In the package: 
1* Microdot 4016 headset microphone 
1* Microdot Detachable Cable With Connector 
1* Foam windshield
feature_bullets: Microdot Detachable Cable with 4 pin mini XLR TA4F connector, Compatible with Shure Wireless Transmitter Models: L1, 11, LX1, SC1, U1, UC1, UT1, T1, ULX1, UR1, PGX
Excellent elastic steel bracket and soft plastic ear hang make it more comfortable and stable to adorn

Various connecting plugs for choice, matching all kings of wireless system
